text: Issouf Paro (born 16 October 1994) is a Burkinabé international footballer who plays for French club Niort as a centre back. He previously played in his homeland for Étoile Filante and in South Africa with Santos. ==Career== Born in Bobo-Dioulasso, Paro has played for Étoile Filante, Santos, Niort and Niort II. Paro made his international debut in 2015, and was named in the squad for the 2017 Africa Cup of Nations. ==References== Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Burkinabé footballers Category:Burkina Faso international footballers Category:Étoile Filante de Ouagadougou players Category:Santos F.C. title: Issouf Paro
